Maths

Between 2011 and 2015 I did a PhD with Dr. Bernhard Köck at the University of Southampton. My research was in algebraic K-theory. My thesis was about Grayson's algebraic presentation of the higher algebraic K-groups.

Publications

  1. Algebraic proofs of some fundamental theorems in algebraic K-theory
    in Homology, Homotopy and Applications 17 (2015), no. 1, 267-280.

  2. Exterior power operations on higher K-groups via binary complexes
    (with Bernhard Köck and Lenny Taelman)
    in Annals of K-Theory 2-3 (2017), 409--450.

Other

Here are some notes on the Pisano semiperiod.

The series of seminars for undergraduates I started while I was a graduate student is still going strong.
